data.title: City of Longmont
data.meta_description: The Longmont Public Library serves our community by providing equal access to information and resources for education, enrichment, enlightenment and enjoyment.
data.text:
Search the Library Catalog

Browse the Library's online catalog and curated book lists to find your next great read.

Manage Your Library Account

The Library offers multiple ways to access your Library account. Have your library card number and pin number ready (Your pin is the last four digits of your phone number).

NOTE: Make sure that you use all 14 digits of your library card number when renewing by phone.

Access My Library Account Online

You can do lots of handy things by accessing your Library account online, including renewing Library materials, and finding out the status of any holds you've placed on materials.

Other Ways to Access Your Account

Learn how to set up text notifications or email notifications. Having trouble? Call the Circulation Desk during open hours at 303-651-8476.

Fall/Winter Season

September – December 2024

FREE programs & services

Check out what’s happening at the Longmont Library for patrons of all ages! Pick up a brochure at one of our service points or read more about our Fall/Winter season online.

View Calendar of Events

Book Chatter Podcast

Get to know your Longmont Library staff and see what they're recommending to read next!

Novelist

Find new Fiction authors and titles based on topics of interest or other books enjoyed!

Select Reads

See book reviews from Publishers Weekly, the New York Times Book Review, and others. Plus, sign up to receive book list newsletters and bestseller awards!

New Book Alerts

See new titles purchased by the Longmont Library. Plus, sign up to receive alerts when new titles are in and place holds so you're next in line to check it out!

Author Spotlight

Create and save a list of your favorite authors to receive email notifications when the Library orders a new title.

Pick a Book for Me!

Fill out an easy form with books you've enjoyed in the past and our Longmont Librarians will send you a list of books you should check out next!
